job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly indicates the need to understand the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: understand the business context within which AI solutions are embedded
job_tasks.justification: This phrase explicitly states the requirement to comprehend the business environment for AI solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Participate in the ideation and design of AI solutions with intrapreneurs and business experts
job_tasks.justification: Collaboration with business experts in ideation and design points to understanding business needs.

job_tasks.phrase: Support initiatives at S&I (new value propositions, innovations) with data-driven insights
job_tasks.justification: Supporting business initiatives implies understanding their goals and providing relevant insights.

job_tasks.phrase: drive the adoption of AI across the bank by working with Client Units on some of the hardest AI problems
job_tasks.justification: Driving AI adoption within business units requires understanding their challenges and needs.
Developing AI solutions inherently involves modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: strong machine learning, system design and coding skills
job_tasks.justification: Machine learning skills are central to modeling.
Leveraging Generative AI implies working with and applying generative models.
Developing AI systems involves model creation and implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: exploring and identifying opportunities, experimenting, and creating prototypes
job_tasks.justification: Experimenting and creating prototypes are core activities in model development.
Developing products based on AI solutions involves underlying models.

job_tasks.phrase: implement new AI technologies (like chatGPT), algorithms and methods
job_tasks.justification: Implementing new AI technologies and algorithms directly relates to modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: bring AI solutions from idea to production
job_tasks.justification: Moving solutions from idea to production involves software development practices.
System design is a fundamental aspect of software development.
Coding is the core of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: range from Backend to Frontend to API's
job_tasks.justification: Backend, Frontend, and API development are all core software development tasks.
Developing scalable products requires robust software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: bring AI solutions from idea to production
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'to production' implies deployment and maintenance, which are MLOps activities.
Scalable products in AI contexts often involve productionization and monitoring, key MLOps concerns.

soft_skills.phrase: work directly with entrepreneurs and business counterparts
work with intrapreneurs and business experts

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing solutions using Generative AI (GenAI, chatGPT) and building applications around them, including APIs and backend/frontend components. There's a clear focus on the full development cycle from ideation to production, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
